Key Match Events: Lane Thomas hit a grand slam off Tigers ace Tarik Skubal in the fifth inning to lead the Guardians to a 7-3 win.
Post-Match Reflections: Tigers manager A.J. Hinch said, 'I have a heartbroken team for all the right reasons. We left everything on the field against a really good team.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Kerry Carpenter, whose status was in doubt after he left Game 4 with a hamstring injury, entered as a pinch-hitter in the fifth inning against Guards right-handed reliever Andrew Walter.

Guardians rookie right-hander Cade Smith started the parade of relievers. He struck out three over 1 2/3 scoreless innings. Smith pitched in all five games of the ALDS and set a Division Series relief record with 12 strikeouts by a reliever.
